text: 18.19-21 Apo 17.17, Lom 1.10, 1 Ko 4.19, Hib 6.3, Jem 4.15 Pen kɨli am am taun Epesus amjakɨl, Pol ne Juda apnan gɨpal kal mɨgan ak amɨl, Juda binɨb okok ayɨp, takaw ag amɨl apɨl gak. Anɨgek, nop agɨlak, Ñɨn ogɨnap sek chɨn ayɨp awl yenɨmɨn agɨlak. Anɨb agɨlak ak pen, takaw kɨlop ak ma dɨl agak, Nɨbi mɨdem yad amebin agak. God yɨp yaw agenɨgab, kɨdek adɨkɨd ownɨgayn agak. Anɨb agɨl, Akwila bel kɨlop, binɨb anɨb okok ayɨp aglɨl, ne sip dɨl, taun Epesus kelɨgɨl,
